alert.note: Alert for Randolph; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 7:05PM CDT until April 15 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WOODRUFF...SOUTHEASTERN INDEPENDENCE...SOUTHERN RANDOLPH...JACKSON...NORTHEASTERN WHITE AND LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 705 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Walnut Ridge to near Cash to near Algoa, moving east at 45 mph. This line of thunderstorms has a history of producing 60 mph wind gusts. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Newport... Walnut Ridge... Hoxie... Black Rock... Lake Charles State Park... Tuckerman... Diaz... Swifton... College City... Portia... Grubbs... Lynn... Oil Trough... Jacksonport... Tupelo... Alicia... Minturn... Algoa... Steprock... Bradford... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
